text: Dosi, deyaki lyudy vstanovlyuyutʹ idoliv konkuruvaty BOH, ta lyublyatʹ yikh tak, yakby vony BOH. Tsey khto viryatʹ BOHU kokhannya naybilʹsh. Yakby tilʹky porushnyky mohly pobachyty sebe koly vony bachatʹ retribution! Vony zdiysnyatʹ todi shcho vsyu potuzhnistʹ nalezhytʹ BOHU vyklyuchno, ta shcho BOZHYY retribution awesome
